Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the COVIDSafe app has the capability to track a person's location or monitor their movements.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove its validity.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the text message is genuine and accurately represents the functionality of the COVIDSafe app.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the text message is a hoax and not a genuine message from the app.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the capabilities of the COVIDSafe app by suggesting that it can track a person's location.
Understate: The claim may understate the efforts made by the government to address privacy concerns related to the app.
